code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> Initializing: App starts

    Initializing --> Loading: Load cached notifications
    Loading --> Subscribing: Cache loaded
    Loading --> Error: Load failed

    Subscribing --> Active: Subscriptions ready
    Subscribing --> Error: Subscription failed

    Active --> Active: New notification arrives
    Active --> Processing: User interaction
    Active --> Updating: Mark as read

    Processing --> Active: Interaction complete
    Updating --> Active: Update complete

    Active --> Cleanup: 30 days passed
    Cleanup --> Active: Old notifications removed

    Error --> Retrying: Retry after delay
    Retrying --> Subscribing: Retry attempt
    Retrying --> Failed: Max retries reached

    Failed --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]: Unrecoverable error

    state Active {HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> Unread
        Unread --> Read: Mark as read
        Read --> Archived: Archive
        Archived --> Deleted: Delete
        Deleted --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    }

    note right of Active
        Notification lifecycle:
        - Arrives as Unread
        - User marks as Read
        - Auto-archived after 7 days
        - Deleted after 30 days
    end note

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine。
不，其实叫 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理 会更准确一点。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine处理'？
